scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, possibly a prophet or saint, is depicted in profile, looking upwards with clasped hands in prayer. He wears a simple robe and a distinctive horned headdress. He is positioned within an architectural setting that includes a column on the left and an arched structure above, suggesting a sacred or contemplative space. The background is filled with a stippled pattern, common in manuscript illuminations to represent a divine or ethereal atmosphere.
